data.name: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to The Cradle, where a Trail called, "The Sleeper Quest" resides between reality and dreams. The Sleeper must find The Dream to complete The Sleeper Quest, which holds a mixture of challenges such as puzzles, mazes, platforming and riddles. Come cleanse your Game Palate with A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee!


Key Features:
  • A vast mysterious labyrinth with things to uncover, explore and get lost in.
  • Challenging and fun, basic FPS 3D Platforming.
  • Save your location within the Labyrinth using checkpoints.
  • Uncover and survive challenges while trying to find where The Dream lies.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to The Cradle, where a Trail called, "The Sleeper Quest" resides between reality and dreams. data.short_description: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee is a simple, unique and difficult 3D Maze Platformer that requires platforming precision, patience and memorization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 4690k
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GeForce gtx 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
